column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Knowing that most people expect the Giordano's experience when they visit Chicago
column2: I wanted to treat my friends to something different. Â I remember Leona's from when I was a kid in the North Side off Belmont
column3: but things have changed in the last few decades
column4: so we thought we should try Lou Malnati's Pizzeria--and it was a great choice!
